items.title: Classic Omelette
items.short_description: Fluffy omelette filled with your choice of ingredients.

items.title: Avocado Toast
items.short_description: Toasted bread topped with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and fresh herbs.

items.title: Pancakes with Maple Syrup
items.short_description: Fluffy pancakes served with warm maple syrup and a side of fresh berries.

items.title: Caesar Salad
items.short_description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and homemade Caesar dressing.

items.title: Chicken Wrap
items.short_description: Grilled chicken, lettuce, tomatoes, and creamy dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

items.title: Quinoa Salad
items.short_description: A refreshing salad with quinoa, mixed greens, cucumbers, and tangy vinaigrette.

items.title: Grilled Salmon
items.short_description: Freshly grilled salmon fillet served with steamed vegetables and lemon butter sauce.

items.title: Mushroom Risotto
items.short_description: Creamy risotto cooked with a variety of mushrooms and topped with Parmesan cheese.

items.title: Beef Tenderloin
items.short_description: Tender and juicy beef tenderloin steak served with mashed potatoes and red wine sauce.
